resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104729</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104729</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206711</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water-Borne Illnesses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit Wasserspülung Krankheiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maladies Portées par les eaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Doenças Water-Borne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Malattie Portate dall'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλωτές ασθένειες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enfermedades Flotantes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">helps students learn about water pollution, water-related illnesses, and sanitation procedures. They then draft a simulated plan to submit to the World Health Organization to deal with water-related problems in African communities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfen Kursteilnehmer erlernen über 
Wasserverunreinigung, Wasser-in Verbindung stehende Krankheiten und 
Hygieneprozeduren. Sie zeichnen dann einen simulierten Plan, um 
bei der Weltgesundheitsorganisation beim Abkommen mit Wasser-in 
Verbindung stehenden Problemen in den afrikanischen Gemeinschaften 
einzugeben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants d'aides se renseignent sur la 
pollution de l'eau, les maladies eau-connexes, et les procédures 
d'hygiène. Ils dessinent alors un plan simulé pour soumettre 
à l'organisation mondiale de la santé à l'affaire avec des 
problèmes eau-connexes dans les communautés africaines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os estudantes das ajudas aprendem sobre a 
poluição da água, doenças água-relacionadas, e procedimentos do 
sanitation. Esboçam então uma planta simulada para submeter-se
à organização de saúde de mundo ao negócio com problemas 
água-relacionados em comunidades africanas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli allievi di aiuti imparano circa inquinamento 
dell'acqua, le malattie acqua-relative e le procedure di risanamento. 
Allora disegnano un programma simulato per presentare 
all'Organizzazione Mondiale della Sanità all'affare con i problemi 
acqua-relativi nelle Comunità africane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βοηθά τους σπουδαστές να μάθουν για τη ρύπανση των 
υδάτων, τις ύδωρ-σχετικές με το ασθένειες, και τις διαδικασίες 
υγιεινής. Συντάσσουν έπειτα ένα μιμούμενο σχέδιο που 
υποβάλλει στην Παγκόσμια Οργάνωση Υγείας για να εξετάσουν τα 
ύδωρ-σχετικά με το προβλήματα στις αφρικανικές κοινότητες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los estudiantes de las ayudas aprenden sobre la 
contaminación del agua, enfermedades agua-relacionadas, y 
procedimientos del saneamiento. Entonces bosquejan un plan 
simulado para someter a la Organización Mundial de la Salud al 
reparto con problemas agua-relacionados en comunidades africanas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206711</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104729</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/water-borne-illnesses-1</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
